Container.Name: BTSync
Container.Description: [h3]BitTorrent Sync[/h3]BitTorrent Sync, or simply - Sync - is an application for data synchronization. Its primary goal is to keep designated folder content same on 2 or more devices / computers. As soon as something changes on one computer, change (would it be changed content of a file, file renaming or deletion, etc.) should be propagated to all other computer(s) that want to keep the folder synchronized.Sync is available for a bunch of platforms, both desktop and mobile, which gives a good usage flexibility. This template will run the latest version available[br][br] [b]/config[/b] : this path is where Bittorrent Sync will store it\'s configuration files. [br] [b]/sync[/b] : this path is where Bittorrent Sync will share files from. [br] [b]SYNC_PORT[/b] : this is the port Bittorrent Sync will use for data transfers. [br] [b]WEB_PORT[/b] : this is the port Bittorrent Sync will use for the web gui. [br] [span style=\'color: #E80000;\']If changing SYNC_PORT and WEB_PORT values please ensure you change the maps as well.[/span][br]
